messages.subject: Re: 'Off Topic' posts
messages.msgSnippet: As OT posts tend to only occasionally pop up in this group compared to most others, I do tend to be fairly lenient as long as the topic has at least a general
messages.messageBody:
As OT posts tend to only occasionally pop up in this group compared to most
others, I do tend to be fairly lenient as long as the topic has at least a general
relation to Japan, but I'll bring attention (yet again) to the fact that there are
a few other groups that I moderate which fit the category of "Off-Topic Japan-
Related posts", so I'll encourage anyone interested to visit them all:

Japan-O-Rama: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/japantoday/
This is the epitome of the OT discussion - ANYTHING even vaguely related to Japan
is encouraged, doesn't matter one bit what it is if you can find some vague and
tenuous relation to Japan.

Japanese Entertainment: http://forums.delphiforums.com/jtainment/start
A forum for anything and everything related to Japanese entertainment, movies,
anime, etc.

Modern Japan: http://forums.delphiforums.com/mjapan/start
A forum for anything Japan related from the 20th century onward.

Foreign Policy and International Affairs:
http://forums.delphiforums.com/poliscience/start
Anything political science related.

Regards,
Your Moderator.
